Title: Asterix and the Golden Sickle
Author: René Goscinny
Description: It's a disaster - the druid Getafix has broken his golden sickle. Asterix and Obelix go to Lutetia (now Paris) to buy him a new one. Soon they are tangling with the criminal underworld of the big city - can they outwit Navishtrix, Clovogarlix and the sickle-trafficking gang? Will Getafix ever be able to brew magic potion again?
Author_Desc:
René Goscinny (1926 - 1977) was a French author, editor and humorist, who is best known for the comic book 
  Asterix
, which he created with illustrator Albert Uderzo, and for his work on the comic series Lucky Luke with Morris (considered the series' golden age).
